thread.title: Trump joins mourners at Billy Graham's funeral

title: Trump joins mourners at Billy Graham's funeral
text:
Trump joins mourners at Billy Graham's funeral 6:05pm GMT - 01:53 
The faithful from small towns gathered on Friday with President Donald Trump and other powerful politicians in North Carolina for the funeral of evangelist Billy Graham, who preached to millions around the world in a 70-year career. Rough Cut (no reporter narration). ▲ Hide Transcript ▶ View Transcript
